lead_paragraph: The Yankees acquired Kerry Wood, Lance Berkman and Austin Kearns at the trading deadline, addressing problems they thought they had solved in the off-season.
snippet: The Yankees acquired Kerry Wood, Lance Berkman and Austin Kearns at the trading deadline, addressing problems they thought they had solved in the off-season.

headline.main: In Series of Trades, Yanks Take Another Shot at Firming Up Weak Spots
headline.seo: Yankees Trade for Wood, Berkman and Kearns at Deadline
headline.print_headline: In Series of Trades, Yanks Take Another Shot at Firming Up Weak Spots
